```{r}
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
course <- c("個體經濟學","投資學","總體經濟學")
course
str_subset(course ,"經濟學")
```
detect 是告訴你True or False
```{r}
str_detect(course,"經濟學")
```

```{r}
studentID<-c(
  '410177115','410176080','410174233','410177011','410182045','410176014')
```

```{r}
str_sub(studentID,5,6)
```
第一個數字是開始，第二個數字是結束
```{r}
year <- str_sub(studentID,2,4)
year
major <- str_sub(studentID,5,6)
major
```
str_c 是把字串起來
```{r}
month <- c("3","4","2")
day <- c("11","5","7")
char1 <- c("月","月","月")
char2 <- c("日","日","日")
month
char1
day 
char2
str_c(month,char1,day,char2)
```
也可以只打一個向量
```{r}
str_c(month,c("月"),day,c("日"))
```
也可以單打一個字
```{r}
str_c(month,"月",day,"日")
```
sep="-" 是分隔符號的意思
```{r}
month
day
str_c(month,day, sep="-")
```

```{r}
pp <- c("^","-","=")
qq <- c("-","-","=")
pp
qq
str_c(pp,qq,sep = "_")
```
